anime.name: Dragon Ball Z Kai
anime.info: Goku is back, now married and has a son, Gohan, but just when things were calm and settled a new threat comes which creates adventures and uncover the truth about Goku's origins as a Saiyan, a near to extinct race. Facing enemies far more powerful then before Goku needs to train harder and reach limits he never even dreamed of since what is at stake is the World itself.
#01: "Dragon Soul" (English Version Nicktoons Broadcast) by Vic Mignogna
#01: "Yeah! Break! Care! Break!" (English Version) by Jerry Jewell
#01: "Yeah! Break! Care! Break!" by Tanimoto Takayoshi
#02: "Kokoro no Hane" (Wings of the Heart) by AKB48
"An Ultra-super Dragon Soul" (超☆スーパー Ｄｒａｇｏｎ Ｓｏｕｌ) by Tanimoto Takayoshi (ep 41)
"Cell Games no Oshirase" (セルゲームのお知らせ) by Ohtsuki Kenji (ep 85)
"Dragon Soul" (ドラゴン・ソウル) by Tanimoto Takayoshi (ep 97)
"Ginyu Tokusentai!!" (ギニュー特戦隊！！) by Yamazaki You
"Only a Chilling Elegy ~The Theme of FREEZA~" (ただ凍える挽歌) by Demon Kakka
"Over the Star" (オーバー・ザ・スター) by Oshitani Saki (ep 17)
"Tattahitori no Senshi" (たったひとりの戦士) by Kusao Takeshi (Trunks) (ep 82)
Madman's Official Dragon Ball Z Kai Sales Site
Toei Animation Dragon Ball Kai Official site
